All 220 Niagara Falls Restaurants» The Original Honey's 2002 Military Rd , Niagara Falls , NY 14304 (716) 297-7900 Ranked #110 of 220 restaurants in Niagara Falls 28 Reviews Cuisines: Fast Food 3 visitor photos Restaurant details Update restaurant details Write a Review 28 reviews from our community 33% Recommend Excellent 3 Very good 6 Average 1 Poor 6 Terrible 12 Rating summary Food Service Value Atmosphere 28 reviews sorted by Date Rating English first Any JohnNDonna The Villages, FL Senior Contributor 23 reviews Reviews in 17 cities 15 helpful votes “What a disappointment” Reviewed July 10, 2012 NEW Honey's in the past served good food at a reasonable price. That is history. The new location at Niagara Falls Blvd and I-190 is convenient. The shrimp dinner was good, the fries were the way you would want them. The cole slaw was marginal. The medium wings were so hot that we couldn't finish the order and we have been... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Concetta16 Niagara Falls, New York, United States Senior Reviewer 7 reviews Reviews in 2 cities “dissapointing” Reviewed June 27, 2012 i was so upset with the service and food. our waitress only came to our table to take our order and give us our order. no drink refills,no how was was your meal. we had to search for her to get the bill. did not take the not eaten cold,burnt food back or take it off our order. it was... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 5 more reviews by Concetta16 for Niagara Falls GFamilyfromATL Roswell, Georgia 1 review “Served Rancid Wings!” Reviewed June 25, 2012 We usually love going to Honey's and make it one of the places we visit when we're up in Niagara Falls visiting family. The pizza's good (my extremely picky daughter loves it) and I enjoyed their cream of mushroom soup with brie but on this visit my husband was served rancid, rotten chicken wings. The first few were fine but... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? whywouldntwe Lewiston, New York Reviewer 5 reviews Reviews in 5 cities 2 helpful votes “Bad Food thats overpriced” Reviewed June 24, 2012 If you want subpar pizza thats overpriced then this is the place for you! My undercooked, ketchup sauce with skimpy cheese pizza cost $17.50 for a'Honey's Tray'. Well it's tough to find bad pizza in Niagara Falls as even the average pizza shop slices are better than most other pizza in the US. Not Honeys!! In Niagara Falls you... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Darren S Hamilton, Canada 1 review 1 helpful vote “crap” Reviewed June 10, 2012 1 person found this review helpful we went there tonite. talk about skimpy on the cheese for the nachos and pizza. the wings were over cooked and no flavor the beer was warmer then the food.save your money they were better when they were at the outlet mall.i will not be going back. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? dragon749 Contributor 13 reviews Reviews in 8 cities 8 helpful votes “Not what it used to be” Reviewed June 9, 2012 via mobile 1 person found this review helpful First off, they have moved to a new location.. Its right around the corner. I was thinking about this meal all day, ever since I made plans to meet with an old friend. Good thing we had lots of catching up to do.. It took 1 hr 15min for our pizza to arrive. Food was good other wise, service leads... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? Jane P Toronto, Canada Senior Contributor 32 reviews Reviews in 10 cities 13 helpful votes “Diner fare” Reviewed May 21, 2012 1 person found this review helpful My husband and I eat at Honey's every time we go to the nearby outlet mall. The new location isn't as convenient as the the former - right on the mall parking lot - but was easy to find. The new location is much larger, but somehow lacks the sticky charm of the old place. There are more restrooms -... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? grahamd62 Canada Contributor 11 reviews Reviews in 8 cities 4 helpful votes “WALKED OUT !” Reviewed May 17, 2012 1 person found this review helpful I went to the new location on a Friday night..Never again ..hostess was more concerned about chatting to staff members,instead of seating us...music was very loud and annoying. Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? stilltugboat Hamilton, Canada Contributor 13 reviews Reviews in 3 cities 7 helpful votes “New and Improved” Reviewed May 14, 2012 It had been a few years since we visited Honey's. We had had two bad experiences in a row there and decided to give it a rest. The recently moved to Niagara Falls Blvd. The decor is cleaner. The old location had way to much stuff on the walls. My wife and I shared an order of Nachos and an... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review? See 4 more reviews by stilltugboat for Niagara Falls TheJawsman New York Senior Contributor 23 reviews Reviews in 10 cities 8 helpful votes “Just as good as the original.” Reviewed May 13, 2012 I'm actually surprised at all of the negative reviews this place has gotten. I am reviewing this place as it stands on it's new location on Niagara Falls Blvd. where the old Timberlodge Steak House used to be. This place has certainly improved from when I last went to a Honey's restaurant on Pine Ave. many many years back. All... More Was this review helpful? Yes Problem with this review?
